wikitext.*:
'''''amba''''' is a noun meaning "upwards" or "top" in [[Quenya]]. It derives from the [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme|root]] [[AM-|AM<sup>2</sup>-]]. Compare with ''[[am]]'' in [[Sindarin]].

Examples:
* [[Ambalotsë]] = "Uprising Flower"
* [[Ambaróna]] = "uprising, sunrise, orient"
* [[Ambarussa]] = "Top-russet"

* ''[[The Languages of Tolkien's Middle-earth]]'' by [[Ruth S. Noel]]
